main.name: Dre Graham
main.description: Welcome to my website! I am an aspiring Cloud Solutions Engineer and am using this website to showcase my talent. Feel free to click around and have fun!
main.bio: I'm currently pursuing a B.S. in Cloud Computing from Western Governors University when I'm not traveling with my wife or hiking with my 3 dogs. I have a passion for cloud technologies and aspire to become a Cloud Architect/Engineer.
main.contactmessage: Want to schedule a consultation or have a question? Reach out to me via email or by using the contact form below.

education.description: Completed hands-on coursework in Cloud architecture, systems administration, networking, and cybersecurity.
